description: a(n+1) = a(n) * sum of digits of a(n).
comments: a(n) mod 9 = A010712(n-1) for n > 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 23 2007
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..250
maple: P:=proc(n) local a,i,k,w; a:=2; print(a); for i from 1 by 1 to n do w:=0;k:=a; while k>0 do w:=w+k-(trunc(k/10)*10); k:=trunc(k/10); od; a:=a*w; print(a); od; end: P(1000); - _Paolo P. Lava_, Apr 27 2007
prog: (Haskell)a047892 n = a047892_list !! (n-1)a047892_list = iterate a057147 2  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 19 2014
author: Miklos SZABO (mike(AT)ludens.elte.hu)
